text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I was wondering... Could you treat me<n>one more time?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
You see, when I was little, I read a lot<n>of picture books. They
taught me how<n>to dream.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
So now it's my turn. I want to make a<n>picture book that'll
inspire others to<n>dream.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The skies became dark, and storms<n>raged on for days and
days. Violent<n>winds bellowed down from the<n>mountains as
they shook with anger.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
"I wish someone would make the<n>scary weather go away
and give us<n>clear skies."

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The people all made the same wish,<n>and that's when the
witch appeared.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
As they all looked on expectantly, the<n>witch summoned her
courage and<n>cast a spell.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
A gentle breeze began to blow, and<n>the clouds parted in an
instant.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The mountains regained their lush<n>green, and the air grew
crisp and<n>fresh.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: The people rejoiced and welcomed<n>the witch.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: "So this is why I have these powers!"

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: The witch returned their greetings<n>with a smile.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
And so the witch continued her<n>travels under that big blue
sky, forever<n>and ever...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Using her magic to bring happiness<n>everywhere she went.
